S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: ASL aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between an Archipelagic Sea Lane and its component features.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Structure/equipment
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a navigation aid equipment feature and the structure that supports it.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:remarks: valid structure and equipment features are listed in clause X.X.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Aids to navigation association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between navigational aids and the traffic systems (such as routeing measures) that they define.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Bridge aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: feature association for the binding between a bridge and its component features.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:remarks: a bridge over non-navigable water at the maximum display scale of the ENC data, which does not require its individual components to be encoded, must be encoded, where required, as a Bridge feature of type curve or surface (see clause X.X).

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Bridge association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a bridge and equipment features on the bridge (e.g. lights).

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Caution area association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a caution area and the traffic systems (such as routeing measures) to which the cautionary information applies.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Deep Water route aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a Deep Water route and its component features.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: District boarding locations
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: The binding between a pilotage district and the pilot

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Island aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a named group if islands.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Range system aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between navigational tracks and the navigational aids that define the tracks.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Traffic Separation Scheme aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a Traffic Separation Scheme or a Traffic Separation Scheme System and its component features.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Two-way route aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: a feature association for the binding between a two-way route and its component features.
